'use strict';

var join = require( 'path' ).join;
var licenseHeader = require( '@stdlib/_tools/licenses/header' );
var insertHeader = require( './../lib' );

// Create a header object containing license headers (note: `js_txt` is intentional in order to skirt project conventions):
var headers = {
	'js_txt': licenseHeader( 'Apache-2.0', 'js' )
};

// Generate a list of files in which to insert headers:
var files = [
	join( __dirname, 'fixtures', 'file.js_txt' )
];

// Insert headers:
insertHeader( files, headers, done );

function done( error ) {
	if ( error ) {
		throw error;
	}
}
